Number of levels

Source: R/brmsfit-methods.R, R/generics.R
ngrps.Rd

Extract the number of levels of one or more grouping factors.

# S3 method for brmsfit
ngrps(object, ...)

ngrps(object, ...)

Arguments

object

An R object.
...

Currently ignored.

Value

A named list containing the number of levels per grouping factor.
